alt: Rosalia in a white robe, leaning on a flaming greatsword.
description: Becoming the Godwoken was her true calling.

alt: Portrait of Rosalia, her hair down with french braids on the sides.
description: Rosalia doesn't remember much about this adventure, but it was fun.

alt: Rosalia wearing studded leather armour, a greatsword on her back.
description: As much as she hates wearing armour, this adventure called for it and she had little choice.

alt: Rosalia wearing a whtie robe with a split down the front of the skirt.
description: She gets in to all sorts of fun shenanigans when she isn't working.

alt: Rosalia wearing a strapless white dress with a floor-length skirt.
description: Protecting another while they save the day is Rosalia's ideal adventure.

alt: Rosalia wearing a white dress with a short, torn skirt.
description: She spent more time exploring this land than actually worrying about being Dragonborn.

alt: A shoulders-up shot of Rosalia wearing a white bikini and shawl, with gold accents.
description: The chance to become a Jedi! How could she pass that up?

alt: Rosalia wearing a white strapless dress with a frilled skirt, holding a white greatsword with gold accents.
description: Rosalia doesn't enjoy fighting just for the sake of fighting, but understands the value of honing one's skills. A tournament was a great way to do so.
